costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges
costs.description: On Demand 5 per deployment, 50 per core, 10 per GB ram and 1 per GB disk

manifests.manifest_content:
version: '2.1'
services:
   ess:
      image: elastest/ess:latest
      networks:
         - elastest_elastest
      volumes:
         - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
         - ${ET_DATA_IN_HOST}:${ET_SHARED_FOLDER}
      labels:
         - io.elastest.type=tss
         - io.elastest.tjob.tss.id=ess
         - io.elastest.tjob.tss.type=main
networks:
  elastest_elastest:
    external: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.elastest: true
    io.elastest.service: ess
  name: ess
spec:
  ports:
  - name: "ess-80-host-port"
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80
  - name: "ess-8080-host-port"
    port: 8080
    targetPort: 8080
  selector:
    io.elastest.tjob.tss.id: ess
  type: NodePort
status:
  loadBalancer: {}
---
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
 annotations:
   io.elastest.type: tss
 creationTimestamp: null
 labels:
   io.elastest: true
   io.elastest.deployment: ess
   elastest-tss: ess
 name: ess
spec:
 replicas: 1
 strategy: {}
 template:
   metadata:
     creationTimestamp: null
     labels:
       io.elastest.type: tss
       io.elastest.tjob.tss.id: ess
       io.elastest.tjob.tss.subservice.id: ess
       io.elastest.tjob.tss.type: main
   spec:
     containers:
     - image: elastest/ess:latest
       name: ess
       resources: {}
     restartPolicy: Always
     imagePullPolicy: Always
status: {}
